activities.insSpanish: ENCUENTRA TODAS LAS VOCALES ¡CUIDADO QUE LAS BURBUJAS SE MUEVEN!
activities.insEnglish: FIND THE VOWELS. WATCH OUT FOR TO THE BUBBLES!
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica las vocales.

Se espera que se reconozcan las vocales de entre todas las letras del abecedario.
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify vowels.

Children should find the vowels.

activities.insSpanish: HAZ CLICK SOBRE LA VOCAL CON LA QUE EMPIEZA CADA PALABRA
activities.insEnglish: LOOK AT THE OBJECT AND CLICK ON THE VOWEL IT STARTS WITH
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica la vocal con la que empieza cada palabra.

Se espera que se reconozca el uso de las vocales a partir de su sonido.
activities.nameEnglish: Identify the begining vowel for each object
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify the begining vowel for each object. 

Children should recognize the use of vowels.

activities.insSpanish: HAZ CLICK SOBRE EL DIBUJO QUE EMPIEZA CON CADA VOCAL
activities.insEnglish: CLICK ON THE OBJECT THAT STARTS WITH EACH VOWEL
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica las palabras que empiezan con vocales.

Se espera que se reconozca el uso de las vocales al comienzo de distintas palabras.
activities.nameEnglish: Identify the word that starts with each vowel
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify the word that starts with each vowel

Children should recognize vowels at the begining of words

activities.insSpanish: COMPLETA LA PALABRA CON LAS VOCALES QUE FALTAN
activities.insEnglish: FILL IN THE WORD WITH THE MISSING VOWELS
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica las vocales faltantes en cada palabra.

Se espera que se identifiquen la o las vocales faltantes a partir de su sonido.
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify the missing vowels.

Children should use vowels in words

activities.insSpanish: ESCRIBE LAS ORACIONES USANDO LOS DIBUJOS
activities.insEnglish: WRITE THE SENTENCES USING THE DRAWINGS
activities.infoSpanish:
Crea oraciones usando pictogramas

Se espera que se creen oraciones simples previo a la escritura.
activities.infoEnglish:
Create sentences using pctograms

Children should create sentences before being able to write.

activities.insSpanish: ENCUENTRA TODAS LAS LETRAS ¡CUIDADO QUE LAS BURBUJAS SE MUEVEN!
activities.insEnglish: FIND THE LETTERS. WATCH OUT FOR TO THE BUBBLES!
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica las consonantes.

Se espera que se reconozcan las consonantes de entre todas las letras del abecedario.
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify letters.

Children should find the letters.

activities.insSpanish: HAZ CLICK SOBRE EL DIBUJO QUE EMPIEZA CON CADA LETRA
activities.insEnglish: CLICK ON THE DRAWING THAT STARTS WITH EACH LETTER
activities.nameSpanish: ¿Qué palabras empiezan con la letra indicada?
activities.infoSpanish:
Identifica el objeto que comienza con la letra especificada.

Se espera que se reconozca el uso de las letras a partir de su sonido.
activities.nameEnglish: Identify the word that starts with each letter
activities.infoEnglish:
Identify the object that starts with each letter.

Children should recognize letters

activities.insSpanish: INDICA CUANTAS LETRAS TIENE LA PALABRA
activities.insEnglish: SHOW HOW MANY LETTERS THE WORD HAS
activities.nameSpanish: Cantidad de letras que componen la palabra
activities.infoSpanish:
Indica la cantidad de letras que tiene la palabra.

Se espera que se identifique la cantidad de letras para componer palabras
activities.nameEnglish: Amount of letters the word has
activities.infoEnglish:
Show how many letters the word has.

Children should recognize the amount of letters and then spell words.

activities.insSpanish: ELIGE LAS LETRAS QUE FORMAN EL SONIDO
activities.insEnglish: CHOOSE THE LETTERS THAT FORM THE SOUND
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige las letras que forman el sonido.

Se espera que se reconozcan los distntos sonidos al unir dos letras.
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the letters that make the sound you hear.

Children should be able to recognize the sounds letter do when put together.

activities.insSpanish: ELIGE EL PRINCIPIO DE LAS PALABRAS QUE SEA IGUAL
activities.insEnglish: CHOOSE THE BEGINING OF THE WORDS THAT ARE THE SAME
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige el principio de las alabras que sea igual.

Se espera que se identifiquen los sonidos iguales.
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the begining of the words that are the same.

Children should be able to identify begining sounds

activities.insSpanish: ELIGE EL FINAL DE LAS PALABRAS QUE SEA IGUAL
activities.insEnglish: CHOOSE THE ENDING OF THE WORDS THAT ARE THE SAME
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige el final de las alabras que sea igual.

Se espera que se identifiquen los sonidos iguales.
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the ending of the words that are the same.

Children should be able to identify ending sounds

activities.insSpanish: HAZ CLICK SOBRE LAS SÍLABAS QUE FORMAN LA PALABRA.
activities.insEnglish: CLICK ON THE SYLLABLES THAT FORM THE WORD
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige las sílabas que forman la palabra presentada.

Se espera componer palabras a partir de sus sílabas. Como así también, separar palabras en sílabas correctamente.
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the syllables that forma the word.

Children should form words out of their syllables.

activities.insSpanish: ELIGE LAS LETRAS QUE FORMAN LA PALABRA
activities.insEnglish: CHOOSE THE LETTERS THA SPELL THE WORD
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige las letras que componen la palabra.

Se espera que se reconozcan las letras de una palabra a partir del sonido
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the letters that spell the word.

Children should identify theletters in a word.

activities.insSpanish: REORDENA LAS LETRAS PARA FORMAR LA PALABRA
activities.insEnglish: PUT THE LETTERS IN ORDER TO WRITE THE WORD
activities.infoSpanish:
Reordena las letras para formar la palabra.

Se espera que se reconozca el orden de las letras a partir del sonido.
activities.infoEnglish:
Put the letters in order to write the words.

Children should identify letter order to write words.

activities.infoSpanish:
Mira y escucha el objeto, luego escribe la palabra.

Se espera comenzar con la escritura de palabras simples.
activities.infoEnglish:
Look and listen to the object, then write the word.

Children should start writing small words

activities.infoSpanish:
Encuentra la palabra incorrecta

Se espera que se reconozcan palabras similares como distintas
activities.infoEnglish:
Find the word that has a mistake.

Children should be able to recognize similar words as different

activities.insSpanish: ORDENA LAS PALABRAS DEPENDIENDO DE LA PRIMERA LETRA
activities.insEnglish: PUT THEWORDS IN ORDER LOOKING AT ITS FIRST LETTER
activities.infoSpanish:
Ordena las palabras dependiendo de su primera letra.

Se espera que se reconozca el orden alfabético de las palabras
activities.infoEnglish:
Put the words in order by looking at its first letter

Children should identify alphabetical order

activities.insSpanish: ARRASTRA LAS PALABRAS CORRECTAS PARA FORMAR UNA ORACIÓN.
activities.insEnglish: DRAG THE LETTERS TO CREATE A SENTENCE
activities.infoSpanish:
Elige las palabras para formar una oración.

Se espera crear oraciones simples. Teniendo en cuenta puntuación y secuenciación.
activities.infoEnglish:
Choose the words you need to create the sentence.

Children should form small sentences, paying attention to punctuation.
